overview: This documentation plan outlines the necessary documents to guide developers through understanding and using the Azure DevOps Versioning Tasks codebase. It covers everything from getting started to detailed task-specific instructions.

docs.title: Getting Started Guide
docs.description: Provides an introduction to setting up and using the Azure DevOps Versioning Tasks extension. It covers installation, initial configuration, and basic usage examples.
docs.prerequisites: Basic knowledge of Azure DevOps and YAML syntax.
docs.goal: Enable developers to quickly start using the extension in their pipelines.

docs.title: Comprehensive Overview
docs.description: An overview of the Azure DevOps Versioning Tasks project, including its purpose, key features, and benefits.
docs.goal: Provide a high-level understanding of what the project accomplishes.

docs.title: System Architecture and Key Design Decisions
docs.description: Details the modular architecture of the project and the rationale behind key design decisions. Includes a breakdown of core components and their interactions.
docs.goal: Help developers understand the architectural structure and design choices.

docs.title: Core Workflows and Data Flows
docs.description: Explains the primary workflows and data flows within the extension, focusing on how tasks are executed and interact with each other.
docs.goal: Clarify how data moves through the system and how workflows are structured.

docs.title: High-Level Component Interactions
docs.description: Describes how different components of the extension interact at a high level, highlighting dependencies and shared utilities.
docs.goal: Provide insight into component interactions to aid in debugging and extension.

docs.title: Task-Specific Documentation: CalculateNextVersionV1
docs.description: Detailed documentation for the CalculateNextVersionV1 task, including input parameters, usage strategies, and process descriptions.
docs.goal: Guide developers in using the CalculateNextVersionV1 task effectively.

docs.title: Task-Specific Documentation: CleanSemanticVersionForDockerTagV1
docs.description: Documentation for CleanSemanticVersionForDockerTagV1, detailing its purpose, input parameters, and example usages.
docs.prerequisites: Familiarity with Docker and semantic versioning.
docs.goal: Ensure Docker tags adhere to semantic versioning standards using this task.

docs.title: Task-Specific Documentation: PublishBuildNumberV1
docs.description: Covers the PublishBuildNumberV1 task with detailed instructions on input parameters and integration examples.
docs.prerequisites: Basic understanding of build processes in DevOps.
docs.goal: Enable publishing of build numbers seamlessly within Azure DevOps.
